General.Name: Giyani Metals Corp
General.Description: Giyani Metals Corp. engages in the exploration, evaluation, and development of manganese mining projects in Botswana, Africa. The company's flagship project is the K.Hill project covering a total license area of 2,588 square kilometers located in southeastern Botswana. It also holds interests in Otse and Lobatse manganese prospects. The company was formerly known as Giyani Gold Corp. and changed its name to Giyani Metals Corp. in July 2017. Giyani Metals Corp. was incorporated in 2007 and is based in Vancouver, Canada.
General.Address: 666 Burrard Street, Vancouver, BC, Canada, V6C 2X8
